Analyte(s): Red cell distribution width – standard deviation (RDW-SD)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Stabilized human erythrocytes in isotonic medium
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for COULTER® 4C®-EX 300 Cell Control as a hematology quality control product to monitor COULTER hematology analyzer performance.
Indications for Use Summary: Hematology quality control material used to monitor the performance of COULTER hematology analyzers in conjunction with specific COULTER reagents; assigned values and expected ranges used for instrument performance monitoring and laboratory mean establishment.
